definitions.definition: The state of being honest , honourable , and moral .
examples: You are responsible only for your own uprightness . See to that and all else will take care of itself. - Miles Williams Mathis

definitions.definition: The state of being erect or vertical .
The product or result of being upright .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The state of being honest , honourable , and moral .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The state of being erect or vertical .
( countable ) The product or result of being upright .
